symptoms: Generator stalls after 15 minutes under load, restarts after cooling period.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Fuel vapor lock from failed electric lift pump
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Heat soak timing, known issue on RS20A with pump overheating.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Overheating inverter module triggering protective shutdown
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Occurs during summer load tests, airflow marginal.

root_cause_hypotheses.hypothesis: Faulty coolant temperature sensor reporting false high reading
root_cause_hypotheses.evidence: Sensor shares harness with ECU-1425 code, would explain restart after cool-down.

most_likely_cause: Lift pump overheating and losing pressure during extended run.

recommended_actions.step: Monitor fuel pressure at rail during 20-minute load test
recommended_actions.why: Confirms loss of pressure coinciding with stall.

recommended_actions.step: Infrared scan of inverter cabinet and coolant routing
recommended_actions.why: Identifies localized overheating or blocked airflow.

recommended_actions.step: Inspect lift pump wiring and replace with updated Cummins kit if pressure drops
recommended_actions.why: Known corrective action for ECU-1425 on this model.

safety_notes: Use fire extinguisher nearby when working on fuel system.
disclaimers: Run tests with facility load bank to replicate failure safely.

confidence.assessment: Pattern fits lift pump heat failure but needs live fuel data.

confidence_uplift_requirements: Fuel pressure trace during shutdown event
Inverter temperature reading at time of stall

customer_readiness_check.short_reason: Provide fuel pressure log to finalize repair direction.
